channel.title: CVE Feed for Akaunting -- Akaunting
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Akaunting -- Akaunting

item.title: CVE-2021-36805|2024-09-17T04:29:16.452Z -- akaunting -- akaunting
item.description: Akaunting version 2.1.12 and earlier suffers from a persistent (type II) cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the sales invoice processing component of the application. This issue was fixed in version 2.1.13 of the product.

item.title: CVE-2021-36802|2024-09-17T00:11:15.201Z -- akaunting -- akaunting
item.description: Akaunting version 2.1.12 and earlier suffers from a denial-of-service issue that is triggered by setting a malformed 'locale' variable and sending it in an otherwise normal HTTP POST request. This issue was fixed in version 2.1.13 of the product.
